info.title: Enterprise person relation
info.description: This is an abstract person relation manager for teams.

parameter.name: $personID
parameter.description: The person id. Leave empty for creating new person. It is empty by default.

method.name: create

parameter.name: $middlename
parameter.description: The person's middle name. It is empty by default.

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: info
method.description: Get all information for a given person.
method.returndescription: The person's stored information. If the relation has been approved by the person, it will return public information.

method.name: getConnectedPersonInfo
method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: connectToPerson
method.description: Connect the relation person to an existing drovio person account.

parameter.name: $personID
parameter.description: The drovio person id to connect to.

method.name: getDrovioPersonsByMail
method.description: Get the candidate drovio person ids that matches the current person with any email.
method.returndescription: An array of the matched drovio person ids.

method.name: update

parameter.name: $middlename
parameter.description: The person's middle name. It is empty by default.

parameter.name: $notes
parameter.description: The person's notes. It is empty by default.

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: remove
method.description: Remove the current person from the relations list. This will remove the person from any groups also.
method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: getPersons
method.description: Get all persons for a given relation type.

parameter.name: $groupID
parameter.description: The person's group id. If empty, get all persons. It is empty by default.

method.returndescription: An array of all persons with the same relation.
